trends: There have been no other sightings in james city
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsdriving down route 60 near the intersection of 199 where busch gardens comes into view. looking up to see an object traveling very slowly with a 3\4 moon visable in the background and not a cloud in the sky. watched it move east over interstate 64 and over navy supply base and york river. must have been at medium altitude of about 2000 feet. average size of jumbo jet without wings and no sound. single cylinder, white and shiny with a broad light (spot light) in the bow\front that moved and gave the image of multiple lights at once. it was bright daylight but the broad light was intense almost like a mirror reflector. by the time i parked with camera in hand, it had moved out of sight. i was a busy street, busch gardens was packed. someone else must have seen it, notice it, questioned it.
Summary: Slow moving white cigar shaped above Busch Gardens moving slowly
